response.original_title: Ken Davis & Friends: Get 'em While They're Hot!
response.overview: In this 3rd edition of Ken Davis? very popular ?Friends? series, Ken introduces four more of the funniest guys around: The hilarious wit of John Branyan, David P. Dean?s outrageous observations about life, the sizzling duo Bean & Bailey, and the ?Stop! I can?t breathe? comedy of master ventriloquist, David Pendleton, all wrapped up with a good dose of Ken?s classic humor.
response.tagline: 5 time the laughter Only half the calories!
response.title: Ken Davis & Friends: Get 'em While They're Hot!
